mapper.select: /* com.cj.freshway.fs.cps.airstar.middleware.AirstarInterfaceInfoMapper.getAirstarInterfaceInfo [Airstar 인터페이스 정보 조회] */ SELECT COMM_CD as ifId, COMM_CD_NM as ifName, CHARTR_REF1 as destinationMethod, CHARTR_REF2 as destinationUrl, CHARTR_REF3 as destinationPath FROM fscps.CM_CODE_M_IF WHERE COMM_CL_CD = 'FP130' AND COMM_CD = #{ifId}
